title: Why did Southport mess-up their waterfront parking at the end of Howe Street? My wife and I would drive down to Southport and park looking out over the river and watch the ferry, barges, tankers and other boats go by. They have now removed the waterfront parking spaces and put more spaces in the middle. That was one of our weekly things to do. While we were there we would usually visit one or more of the area businesses. No reason to drive to Southport anymore.
